conclusion: Analyze the velocity-time graph to determine the distance fallen during the 0 to 10 seconds interval.
Identify the velocity-time graph showing vertical movement in meters per second over time in seconds.
Determine the velocity at different points in the graph, with velocity given as 20 m/s at 10 seconds.
Calculate the distance fallen during the 0 to 10 seconds interval using the formula Distance = Velocity x Time, resulting in 200 meters.
Compare the calculated distance of 200 meters with 100 meters to conclude that the distance fallen is greater than 100 meters.
